snippet.title: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 25
snippet.description:
Do you crave the madness of March? With Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 25 you can take control of your favorite school and get them on the road to the big dance!

Recruit, strategize, coach and make all the key decisions it takes to build a college basketball dynasty. New this year are NIL Collectives allowing you to have another tool in your arsenal to land that big recruit, a greatly expanded conference editor to let you create the conferences of your dreams, a revamped game engine for even more accurate results and so much more!

Get your copy at www.wolverinestudios.com
